**Meg Marks** - Recruiting/Talent at Heron Data

Introduced Matthew to Heron Data (formerly Heron AI). Company helps clients automate complex document workflows using cutting-edge AI and ML - ingesting documents from email/broker referrals into CRM systems with analysis and metadata extraction. Y Combinator S20 backed.

Exploratory conversation about the role and company culture. Discussed Heron's mission to save "a human lifetime of repetitive work, every day" through document automation. Positive reception to Matthew's background.
